amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Congressional Research Service by $878,000 (FY 2012 Level) and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-518 to reduce funding for the Congressional Research Service by $878,000 (FY 2012 Level) and transfer $878,000 to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 189 (Roll no. 372).
